fullq.question: Which of the following BEST describes how Thomas Young produced sufficiently coherent separate light sources in order to produce interference patterns:
fullq.w_choice: passing coherent light through 2 closely spaced holes in the same opaque screen

fullq.z_choice: passing laser light through 2 holes in a single opaque screen
